title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the option to open/close projects is inconsistently available.
EB: Either both the open and close project options should be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: create two projects P1 and P2. Select P2 and close it.
